question_text: Identify the property used to change text color.
explanation: The 'color' property sets the color of text.

question_text: Select the correct way to link an external CSS file.
explanation: The link tag with rel=stylesheet is used to link external CSS.

question_text: Choose the property for setting background color.
explanation: background-color sets the background color of an element.

question_text: Pick the correct syntax for a CSS comment.
explanation: CSS comments use /* */ syntax.

question_text: Determine which selector targets all paragraph elements.
explanation: 'p' is the element selector for paragraph elements.

question_text: Find the property used to make text bold.
explanation: font-weight controls the thickness of text (bold is typically 700).

question_text: Recognize the correct class selector syntax.
explanation: Class selectors start with a dot (.) followed by the class name.

question_text: Locate the correct ID selector syntax.
explanation: ID selectors start with a hash (#) followed by the ID name.

question_text: Match the property for text alignment.
explanation: text-align controls horizontal alignment of text.

question_text: Select the property for removing underlines from links.
explanation: text-decoration: none; removes underlines from links.

question_text: Identify the property for setting font size.
explanation: font-size controls the size of text.

question_text: Choose the correct way to set margin.
explanation: margin: value; sets margin on all sides.

question_text: Pick the property for element padding.
explanation: padding creates space inside an element, between content and border.

question_text: Determine which value makes text italic.
explanation: font-style: italic; makes text italic.

question_text: Find the property for setting element width.
explanation: width controls the width of an element.

question_text: Recognize the correct border property.
explanation: set-border: 1px solid black;,A,border: width style color; is the correct syntax.

question_text: Locate the property for setting background image.
explanation: background-image sets an image as the background.

question_text: Match the property for element display type.
explanation: display controls how an element is shown (block, inline, etc.).

question_text: Select the correct value for hiding an element.
explanation: display: none; completely removes element from layout.

question_text: Identify the property for setting list style.
explanation: list-style controls bullet/number style for lists.

question_text: Choose the property for element positioning.
explanation: position controls positioning method (static, relative, absolute, etc.).

question_text: Pick the correct value for absolute positioning.
explanation: position: absolute; positions element relative to nearest positioned ancestor.

question_text: Determine which property sets element height.
explanation: height controls the height of an element.

question_text: Find the property for controlling text case.
explanation: text-transform changes text capitalization (uppercase, lowercase, etc.).

question_text: Recognize the property for line spacing.
explanation: line-height controls the height of text lines.

question_text: Locate the property for setting font family.
explanation: font-family specifies the font for text.

question_text: Match the property for element opacity.
explanation: opacity controls transparency (0=transparent, 1=opaque).

question_text: Select the property for text shadow.
explanation: text-shadow adds shadow to text.

question_text: Identify the property for box shadow.
explanation: box-shadow adds shadow effects around an element's frame.

question_text: Choose the property for setting cursor type.
explanation: cursor specifies the mouse cursor to display.

question_text: Pick the correct overflow property.
explanation: overflow controls what happens when content overflows element boundaries.

question_text: Determine which value creates a block-level element.
explanation: display: block; makes element a block-level element.

question_text: Find the property for controlling float.
explanation: float places an element to left/right allowing text to wrap around it.

question_text: Recognize the property for clearing floats.
explanation: clear specifies whether element can be next to floated elements.

question_text: Locate the property for setting z-index.
explanation: z-index controls stacking order of positioned elements.

question_text: Match the property for setting border radius.
explanation: border-radius creates rounded corners.

question_text: Select the property for text indentation.
explanation: text-indent indents the first line of text.

question_text: Identify the property for letter spacing.
explanation: letter-spacing increases/decreases space between characters.

question_text: Choose the property for word spacing.
explanation: word-spacing increases/decreases space between words.

question_text: Pick the property for white space handling.
explanation: white-space controls how whitespace inside element is handled.

question_text: Determine the property for vertical alignment.
explanation: vertical-align sets vertical alignment of inline/inline-block elements.

question_text: Find the property for text overflow handling.
explanation: text-overflow controls how overflowed text is signaled to users.

question_text: Recognize the property for background repeat.
explanation: background-repeat sets if/how background image repeats.

question_text: Locate the property for background position.
explanation: background-position sets initial position of background image.

question_text: Match the property for background size.
explanation: background-size sets size of background image.

question_text: Select the property for setting minimum width.
explanation: min-width sets minimum width of an element.

question_text: Identify the property for setting maximum width.
explanation: max-width sets maximum width of an element.

question_text: Choose the property for setting minimum height.
explanation: min-height sets minimum height of an element.

question_text: Pick the property for setting maximum height.
explanation: max-height sets maximum height of an element.

question_text: Determine which selector targets direct children.
explanation: > selects direct children only (not all descendants).

question_text: Find the selector for adjacent sibling.
explanation: + selects immediately following sibling element.

question_text: Recognize the selector for general sibling.
explanation: ~ selects all following sibling elements.

question_text: Locate the attribute selector for exact match.
explanation: [attribute=value] selects elements with exact attribute value.

question_text: Match the pseudo-class for hover state.
explanation: :hover applies styles when mouse hovers over element.

question_text: Select the pseudo-class for active/focus state.
explanation: :focus applies styles when element receives focus.

question_text: Identify the pseudo-class for visited links.
explanation: :visited styles links that have been visited.

question_text: Choose the pseudo-class for first child.
explanation: :first-child selects first child element of its parent.

question_text: Pick the pseudo-class for last child.
explanation: :last-child selects last child element of its parent.

question_text: Determine the pseudo-class for nth child.
explanation: :nth-child() selects elements based on their position.

question_text: Find the pseudo-element for first line.
explanation: ::first-line styles first line of a block-level element.

question_text: Recognize the pseudo-element for first letter.
explanation: ::first-letter styles first letter of a block-level element.

question_text: Locate the pseudo-element for before content.
explanation: ::before inserts content before element's content.

question_text: Match the pseudo-element for after content.
explanation: ::after inserts content after element's content.

question_text: Select the property for CSS transitions.
explanation: transition creates smooth transitions between property values.

question_text: Identify the property for CSS animations.
explanation: animation applies keyframe-based animations.

question_text: Choose the at-rule for defining keyframes.
explanation: @keyframes defines the animation sequence.

question_text: Pick the property for transform effects.
explanation: transform applies 2D/3D transformations to elements.

question_text: Determine which value rotates an element.
explanation: transform: rotate() rotates an element.

question_text: Find the value for scaling an element.
explanation: transform: scale() scales an element larger or smaller.

question_text: Recognize the value for translating/moving element.
explanation: transform: move(50px, 50px);,A,transform: translate() moves element horizontally/vertically.

question_text: Locate the property for flexbox layout.
explanation: display: flex; enables flexbox layout.

question_text: Match the flex property for item growth.
explanation: flex-grow defines ability for item to grow if necessary.

question_text: Select the property for flex direction.
explanation: flex-direction sets direction of flex items (row/column).

question_text: Identify the property for flex wrapping.
explanation: flex-wrap controls whether flex items wrap to multiple lines.

question_text: Choose the property for justify content.
explanation: justify-content aligns flex items along main axis.

question_text: Pick the property for align items.
explanation: align-items aligns flex items along cross axis.

question_text: Determine the property for CSS Grid.
explanation: display: grid; enables CSS Grid layout.

question_text: Find the property for grid template columns.
explanation: grid-template-columns defines columns in grid.

question_text: Recognize the property for grid gap.
explanation: gap sets spacing between grid items (shorthand for row/column gap).

question_text: Locate the property for media queries.
explanation: @media rule applies styles based on device characteristics.

question_text: Match the unit for viewport width.
explanation: vw is viewport width unit (1vw = 1% of viewport width).

question_text: Select the unit for root element font size.
explanation: rem is relative to root element's font size.

question_text: Identify the unit for parent element font size.
explanation: em is relative to parent element's font size.

question_text: Choose the property for CSS variables.
explanation: CSS custom properties start with -- (double hyphen).

question_text: Pick the function to use CSS variables.
explanation: var() function retrieves value of custom property.

question_text: Determine which property controls box sizing.
explanation: box-sizing controls how element's total width/height is calculated.

question_text: Find the value for border-box sizing.
explanation: border-box includes padding and border in element's total dimensions.

question_text: Recognize the property for object fit.
explanation: object-fit controls how replaced content fits its container.

question_text: Locate the property for filter effects.
explanation: filter applies graphical effects like blur, brightness, etc.

question_text: Match the property for CSS blend modes.
explanation: mix-blend-mode blends element with background; background-blend-mode blends background layers.

question_text: Select the property for clip path.
explanation: clip-path creates clipping region to show part of element.

question_text: Identify the property for CSS masks.
explanation: mask and mask-image properties create masking effects.

question_text: Choose the property for CSS columns.
explanation: columns is shorthand for column-count and column-width.

question_text: Pick the property for CSS counters.
explanation: Multiple properties work together to create and use CSS counters.

question_text: Determine which at-rule imports styles.
explanation: @import imports external stylesheets.

question_text: Find the property for CSS scroll behavior.
explanation: scroll-behavior: smooth; creates smooth scrolling.

question_text: Recognize the property for pointer events.
explanation: pointer-events controls how element responds to mouse/touch events.

question_text: Locate the property for user select.
explanation: user-select controls whether text can be selected.

question_text: Match the property for CSS aspect ratio.
explanation: aspect-ratio sets preferred aspect ratio for box.

question_text: Select the property for CSS containment.
explanation: contain indicates element's content is independent from rest of page.

question_text: Identify the property for CSS isolation.
explanation: isolation creates new stacking context without affecting z-index.

question_text: Choose the property for CSS backdrop filter.
explanation: backdrop-filter applies filter effects to area behind element.

question_text: Pick the property for CSS scroll snap.
explanation: Multiple scroll-snap properties control scroll snapping behavior.

question_text: Determine which function calculates values.
explanation: calc() performs calculations to determine CSS property values.

question_text: Find the property for CSS initial value.
explanation: initial sets property to its initial/default value.

question_text: Recognize the property for inheriting value.
explanation: inherit makes element inherit computed value from parent.

question_text: Locate the property for CSS custom fonts.
explanation: @font-face defines custom fonts to be used on webpage.

question_text: Match the selector for empty elements.
explanation: :empty selects elements with no children (including text nodes).

question_text: Select the selector for required fields.
explanation: :required selects form elements with required attribute.

question_text: Identify the selector for checked elements.
explanation: :checked selects checked radio buttons, checkboxes, or options.

question_text: Choose the property for CSS content.
explanation: content property used with ::before/::after to insert content.

question_text: Pick the property for CSS quotes.
explanation: quotes property sets quotation marks for quotes.

question_text: Determine which property creates stacking context.
explanation: Multiple properties can create stacking context: isolation, z-index, position, etc.

question_text: Find the property for CSS will-change.
explanation: will-change hints browser about expected changes for optimization.

question_text: Recognize the property for CSS touch action.
explanation: touch-action controls how touch gestures manipulate element.
